title: Lovedol ~Lovely Idol~
overview: Lovedol is a six girl pop-idol group put together by Tomohiro Fujisawa, their manager. The first two Lovedol groups were so highly successful that Tomohiro's boss wants him to make a third group. Trying something different he tries to make a four girl pop-idol group, but their debut gets postponed by the owner. They appear to missing something. That something is anyone guess.
